author: coire1
title: Tales In The Blocks|Collab-writing
description: 書くことや描くことは一人でするものと思われていますが、共同で作品を作るとどのような結果になるでしょうか？

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal has a working demo and a detailed roadmap to success of the next 13 weeks. If successful the product will attract users to the Cardano ecosystem within 90 days. In my opinion, the proposal addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal gave out detailed backgrounds of the developers, however, I would have liked to see a link to LinkedIn or similar for validation. The team provided a link to a working prototype. Given the experience and plan presented I think the team will implement the proposal succesfuly.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal supplied a detailed roadmap and budget breakdown. The KPIs for post-development are well defined. In my opinion, the project will not be difficult to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is presenting an ideal use case for Blockchain. There will be changes required to carry out the protocol based on experience, but the fundamental idea is sound. Collaborative/ Independent authoring of books and a means to sell them.  WIth the popularization of digital books, these experiments are required to monetize creators without unreasonable profits to middlemen.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal seems to be by https://dehlic.com and the sample works on the site are very good. The sample book with has been referenced is not good and it is difficult to estimate the capability of the developer team from the references enclose.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a clear set of APIs and the output will be visible. The progress and the success can be measured in a quantitative manner, therefore this proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: I love this idea, the team will build a platform to create a gamified experience to write and illustrate game-book tales in a collaborative way, further development of this Dapp will expand in kid education, comics... the team don't have a specific part in the proposal to shows detail how their app will help to grow Cardano ecosystem, but look into the UX and KPIs, they include both direct and indirect factor to impact Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1:
Half of the tasks in their roadmap were finished, the remaining will be finished in 3 months after being funded, then the team will launch the product. And that roadmap is enough for assessing their work because the remaining tasks are very simple, not technical. And the team required a reasonable budget for both what they did and what was next in the roadmap. Therefore, there is no doubt this idea will be released successfully, not just because of the experiences of the team but also they already have the MVP and wait for publishing. 
The team was aware of the risk possible risks that are facing, but they also have a plan to solve them. 
In conclusion, this proposal has good feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2:
They provide a good roadmap and sufficient timeline with their ability. And the key metrics, KPIs are very promising and clear. 
The team doesn't explain in detail the problem, I hope that they should study and have a better acknowledge of the context of the problem. The solution is described very detail, including user experience and technical specs that can help everyone understand what product they want to form. Moreover, the team also mention shortly about the marketing plan for launching the product.

solution: ブロックチェーンを利用して、ゲームブックの物語を共同で書いたり、イラストを描いたりするゲーミフィケーション体験を実現するプラットフォームを構築する。
experience:
